duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service by taking orders, assembling and delivering food, and cleaning the dining area.
Thrive in a fast-paced environment by working all shifts and handling various responsibilities.
Adapt to different tasks and roles, such as cashier, cook, or server, by undergoing paid training.
Earn pay increases through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations within the first year.
Follow safety procedures, adhere to Company policies, and work under pressure with a team-oriented approach.
Lift, carry, kneel, ascend, descend, reach, grasp, and communicate effectively with customers and teammates.
